description: A just-in-sequence part is an instantiation of a (design-)part, where the particular instantiation can be uniquely identified by means of a combination of several IDs related to a just-in-sequence process.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_2.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_io.catenax.just_in_sequence_par.description: Constraint that ensures that the predefined keys are used.
A list of key value pairs for local identifiers, which are composed of a key and a corresponding value.

key.description: The key of a local identifier.

urn_samm_io.catenax.just_in_sequence_par.description: A single just-in-sequence part may have multiple attributes, that uniquely identify a that part in a specific dataspace (e.g. the manufacturer`s dataspace)
Regular Expression to enable UTC and Timezone formats and the possibility to exclude time information.
Regular Expression that ensures a three-letter code

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNS is composed of prefix 'BPNS', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.part_site_inf.description: Describes the characteristics of the function for a site related to the respective part.
Describes the ID and function of a site for the associated part in the AsBuilt context(e.g. SerialPart, Batch, jIS).

catenaXsiteId.description: The identifier of the site according to Catena-X BPDM. The catenaXsiteId must be a valid Catena-X BPN. The BPN is a unique, unchangeable identifier for Business Partners / company locations from foundation to closure, regardless of the different business relationships / structures between or within the Business Partners or company locations.

function.description: The function of the site in relation to the part(i.e. the activity within the value chain of the part that is performed at the site)

urn_samm_io.catenax.just_in_sequence_par.description: Characteristic to describe manufacturing related data

date.description: Timestamp of the manufacturing date as the final step in production process (e.g. final quality check, ready-for-shipment event)

country.description: Country code where the part was manufactured

sites.description: A site is a delimited geographical area where a legal entity does business(geographical address with geo coordinates).A site always has a primary physical address. It is possible that further physical addresses are specified for the site. P.O. box details are only possible in addition to the physical address. A site has a 1:n relation to addresses, means at least 1 address is necessary and multiple addresses are possible.

urn_samm_io.catenax.just_in_sequence_par.description: The part ID is a multi-character string, usually assigned by an ERP system. Alternatively the ID of the part family can be used if no specific part ID exists.
Part Name in string format from the respective system in the value chain

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.part_classifi.description: Identified classification standards that align to the Catena-X needs.
It can be numeric or a string, depending on the chosen classification standard.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.part_classifi.description: Encapsulates data related to the classification of the part.

classificationStandard.description: Identified classification standards that align to the Catena-X needs.

classificationID.description: The classification ID of the part type according to the corresponding standard definition mentioned in the key value pair.

classificationDescription.description: Optional property describing the classification standard.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.part_classifi.description: Classification characteristic enabling a set of further properties.

urn_samm_io.catenax.just_in_sequence_par.description: The characteristics of the part type

manufacturerPartId.description:
Part ID as assigned by the manufacturer of the part. The manufacturer Part ID identifies the part (as designed)in the manufacturer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number or any other instance IDs. 
If no specific part ID exists a part family ID may be substituted for it.

customerPartId.description:
Part ID as assigned by the customer of the part. The customer Part ID identifies the part (as designed)in the customer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number or any other instance IDs. 
If no specific part ID exists a part family ID may be substituted for it.

nameAtManufacturer.description: Name of the part as assigned by the manufacturer

nameAtCustomer.description: Name of the part as assigned by the customer

partClassification.description: Property describing the classification of a part.

catenaXId.description: The fully anonymous Catena-X ID of the just-in-sequence part, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

localIdentifiers.description: A local identifier enables identification of a part in a specific dataspace, but is not unique in Catena-X dataspace. Multiple local identifiers may exist.

manufacturingInformation.description: Information from manufacturing process, such as manufacturing date and manufacturing country

partTypeInformation.description: The part type or part family from which the just-in-sequence part has been instantiated.
